name: Kill The Ragdoll Stickman: Dummy Physics
name_original: Kill The Ragdoll Stickman: Dummy Physics
description: Give the stickman pain by throwing him down stairs, from towers, out of a plane, into compactor machines, F1 cars, and even a train. Play god as you boss him around. Addicting stickman fun and lots of levels to play through. Download it now while it's free and be a bad guy ;)
